results.title: Setup a development environment on Windows
results.description: Use whatever coding language or framework you prefer - whether developing with tools on Windows or with Linux tools on the Windows Subsystem for Linux, this guide will help you get set up and install what you need to start coding, debugging, and accessing services to put your work into production. Development paths Follow these guides to set up.
